st: Tute huye dilon ke dua mere sath hai
s:
Tute huye dilon ke dua mere sath hai
duniya teri taraf hai khuda mere sath hai
aavaz ghungharuon ke nahi hai to kya hua
sagar ke tutane ke sada mere sath hai
tanhai kis ko kahate hain mujhko pata nahi
kya jane kis hasin ke dua mere sath hai
paimana samane hai to kuch gham nahi “nizam”
ab dard-e-dil ke koi dawa mere sath hai

st: Apne khvabon mein tujhe jis ne bhi dekha hoga
s:
Apne khvabon mein tujhe jis ne bhi dekha hoga
aankh khulate hi tujhe dhundhane nikala hoga
zindagi sirf tere naam se mansub rahe
jane kitne hi dimagon ne ye socha hoga
dost hum us ko hi paigam-e-karam samajhenge
teri furqat ka jo jalta hua lamha hoga
daman-e-zist mein ab kuch bhi nahi hai baqi
maut aayi to yaqinan
use dhoka hoga
roshni jis se utar aayi lahu mein mere
ae masiha wo mera zakhm-e-tamanna hoga

st: Lamha Lamha Saansein Khatam Ho Rahi Hain
s:
Lamha Lamha Saansein Khatam Ho Rahi Hain
Zindagi Maut Ke Pehloo Mein So Rahi Hai
Us Bewafa Se Naa Poocho Meri Maut Ki Wajah
Woh To Zamaane Ko Dikhaane Ke Liye Ro Rahi Hai

st: Dil Lagi Thi Usey Hum Se Mohabbat Kab Thi
s:
Dil Lagi Thi Usey Hum Se Mohabbat Kab Thi
Mehfil-e-Gair Se Un Ko Fursat Kab Thi
Hum Thay Mohabbat Main Lot Jane K Qabil
Us K Wadoon Main Wo Haqiqat Kab Thi…

st: Us Ne Toda Woh Taluq Jo Humari Har Baat Se Tha
s:
Us Ne Toda Woh Taluq Jo Humari Har Baat Se Tha
Us Ko Dukh Najane Meri Kis Baat Se Tha
Sirf Taluq Raha, Logo Ki Tarha Woh Bhi
Jo Achi Tarha Waqif Meri Har Baat Se Tha

st: Ye Nahi Gam Ke Qasam Apni Bhulai Tum Ne
s:
Ye Nahi Gam Ke Qasam Apni Bhulai Tum Ne
Gam Te Ye Hai Ke Raqeebon Se Nibhai Tum Ne
Koi Ranjish Thi Ager Tum Ko To Mujh Se Kehte
Baat Apas Ki Kiun Sab Ko Batai Tum Ne

Tujhe Ishq Ho Khuda Kare
Koi Tujh Ko Usse Juda Kare
Tere Lub Hansna Bhool Jaen
Or Teri Aankh Purnam Raha Kare
Usse Dekh Ke Tu Ruk Pare
Or Woh Nazar Jhuka Ke Chala Kare
Tujhe Hijr Ki Woh Jhari Lage
Tu Millan Ki Har Pal Dua Kare
Tere Khuwab Bikhrain Tooot Kar
Use Kirchi Kirchi Chuna Kare
Tu Nagar Nagar Phira Kare
Tu Galli Gallli Sada Kare
Tujhe Ishq Ho Phir Yaqeen Ho
Use Tasbeehon Pe Parha Kare
Main Kahoon Ke Ishq Dhong Hai
Or Tu Nahin Nahin Kaha Kare

Anjaane Me Dil Gavaa Baithe
Is Pyaar Me Kaise Dhoka Kha Baithe
Unse Kya Gila Kare, Bhool Toh Humari Thi
Jo Bina Dil Waalon Se Dil Lagaa Baithe

st: Kyon Tune Pyar Main Dhoka Diya
s:
Kyon Tune Pyar Main Dhoka Diya
Kyon Na Sachha Pyar Tha Mujhse Kiya
Khamiyaan Kaun Si Mujhme Thi
Kyon Meri Wafaaon Ka Aisa Sila Hai Diya
Humne To Tujhe Toot Kar Chaha Tha
Duniya Ko Bhi Tere Liye Tha Chhod Diya
Dil Se Khoob Khel Kiya Tune
Kyon Na Mujh Par Tune Ki Daya
Aaj Main Khood Se Naaraz Hoon
Duniya Ki Naa Maan Kar, Kyon Sirf Tera Bharosa Kiya
Loot Kar Meri Duniya Ko
Tune Mujhe Jaise Bin Maut Hi Maar Diya

st: Pal Pal Uska Saath Nibhate Hum
s:
Pal Pal Uska Saath Nibhate Hum
Ek Ishare Pe Dunya Chhor Jate Hum
Samandar K Beech Me Pohanch Kar Fareib Kya Usne
Wo Kehte To Kinaare Pe Hi Doob Jate Hum

st: Beetay Huwe Dinon Ko Bhulaya Nahi Jata
s:
Beetay Huwe Dinon Ko Bhulaya Nahi Jata
Jo Roo Rahay Hon Unko Rulaya Nahi Jata
Hasnay Walon Ko Rulana Aasan Hai
Lekin Ronay Walon Ko Kabhi Hasaya Nahi Jata
Apno Or Geroon Ko Bhulana Asaan Hai Lekin
Dil Todnay Walay Ko Bhulaya Nahi Jata
Umeed Ban Ke Log Zindagi Mai Atey Hain
Khawab Ben Ke Ankhon Mai Sama Jate Hain

Jab gardishon mein jam the
kitne hasin ayyam the
hum hi na the rusava faqat
wo aap bhi badnam the
kahate hain kuch arsa hua
qabe mein bhi asanam the
anjam ke kya sochate
na-vaqif-e-anjam the
ahad-e-javani mein “adam”
sab log gulandam the
